tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_analytics (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_analytics (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_analytics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_posts INT,
    total_likes INT,
    total_comments INT,
    total_shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_history (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    views INT,
    impressions INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_data ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    username VARCHAR(50), 
    post_content TEXT, 
    likes_count INT, 
    comments_count INT, 
    shares_count INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE user_details ( 
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    full_name VARCHAR(100), 
    email VARCHAR(100), 
    date_of_birth DATE, 
    bio TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics ( 
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    post_id INT, 
    engagement_rate FLOAT, 
    reach INT, 
    impressions INT, 
    clicks INT 
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_data ( 
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    budget DECIMAL(10,2) 
);

CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    impressions INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_details (
    user_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    join_date DATE,
    followers INT,
    following INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_details (
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATETIME,
    hashtags VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    impressions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    ad_id INT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    spend DECIMAL(10,2),
    campaign_date DATE
);
